title: Petunia (K)
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Audio Visual Aids
brief_description: Petunia, the silly goose, is the self-appointed adviser to the barnyard animals. Masking her ignorance, she struts around with a book under her wing. However, when she interprets the word DANGER as “candies”, near tragedy results. Based on the book by Roger Duvoisin.
